name: aliasvault
description: AliasVault is a privacy tool that generates and manages email aliases to protect your real address. It supports disposable inboxes, SMTP forwarding, passwordless access and can be self-hosted for complete privacy control.
features: Email Aliases: Generate unlimited aliases to protect your real address. Shield your identity.
Disposable Inboxes: Create temporary email addresses for one-time use. Avoid spam forever.
SMTP Forwarding: Automatically forward emails from aliases to your real inbox. Stay connected safely.
Passwordless Access: Secure authentication without traditional passwords. Simplified security.
Self-Hosted: Run on your own infrastructure for maximum privacy. Complete data ownership.
Alias Management: Organize and control all your email aliases from one dashboard. Centralized control.
Privacy Protection: Keep your real email hidden from websites and services. Stop tracking.
Android App: Manage aliases on the go with native mobile application. Privacy in your pocket.
